techmeme.title: Microsoft unveils Mico, a character that responds with real-time expressions when talked to, now on by default in Copilot's voice mode in the US, UK, and Canada (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Microsoft updates Copilot to add Copilot Groups, enabling up to 32 people to collaborate in a session, and a "real talk" mode to add more personality to Copilot (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Data center startup Crusoe raised $1.4B led by Mubadala and Valor, more than tripling its valuation to $10B+ in one year and taking its total funding to $3.9B (Tabby Kinder/Financial Times)
The UK's Competition Appeal Tribunal rules against Apple in a lawsuit accusing it of abusing its dominant position by charging a 30% App Store commission (Sam Tobin/Reuters)
Super Micro's shares drop 5%+ after the server maker reports it expects $5B in Q1 revenue, down from its $6B to $7B guidance, due to "design win upgrades" (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
